A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Much better than Ep VII\, which I still say was just a reworking of IV.
Needed more of the Ray/Ren/Luke storyline and less Finn and Poe.
While the movie is a little bloated and still familiar (yes\, you will continue to see scenes and beats that we've seen before)\, it does successfully steer the audience to exciting\, new territory.
Standout performances by Hamill (the best portrayal of Luke in the series)\, Driver and Ridley.
Excited for VIII.
